title.native: アークナイツ 黎明前奏

description:
In the land of Terra, natural disasters of unknown causes have been occurring irregularly in many areas. Therefore, the majority of the people, in order to escape those natural disasters, came to live in mobile cities developed over the years. The Originium left behind at the site of such Catastrophes, has led to the rapid progress of civilization due to their immense energy. But it also brought something else with it — an incurable disease called Oripathy.

Because the bodies of those with Oripathy gradually crystalize and become a new source of infection at the time of death, in many countries, the Infected are subject to persecution under regimes of segregation and forced labor. Those who were oppressed by the governments are starting to rebel. Rhodes Island, a pharmaceutical company researching a cure for Oripathy, takes up their arms and starts a conquest trying to save all the people from the disease.

(Source: Official Site, translated, edited)
synonyms: 明日方舟: 黎明前奏

tags.name: Tragedy
tags.description: Centers around tragic events and unhappy endings.

tags.description: Prominently features a disease prevalent over a whole country or the world.

tags.description: Main character is female.

tags.name: War
tags.description: Partly or completely set during wartime.

tags.description: Partly or completely set in a city.

tags.description: Prominently features a character(s) with memory loss.

tags.name: Dystopian
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a society characterized by poverty, squalor or oppression.

tags.name: Super Power
tags.description: Prominently features characters with special abilities that allow them to do what would normally be physically or logically impossible.

tags.name: Kemonomimi
tags.description: Prominently features humanoid characters with animal ears.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Medicine
tags.description: Centered around the activities of people working in the field of medicine.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Found Family
tags.description: Features a group of characters with no biological relations that are united in a group providing social support.

tags.name: Military
tags.description: Centered around the life and activities of military personnel.

tags.name: Guns
tags.description: Prominently features the use of guns in combat.

tags.name: Coming of Age
tags.description: Centers around a character's transition from childhood to adulthood.

tags.name: Twins
tags.description: Prominently features two or more siblings that were born at one birth.

tags.name: Post-Apocalyptic
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a world or civilization after a global disaster.

node.description:
[Website](https://www.hypergryph.com/)

Hypergryph Network Technology Co. Ltd., commonly known as Hypergryph or HG, is a video game development company based in Shanghai, China. It is known as the creator and developer of Arknights and the publisher of the game's original Chinese version. It was founded on January 24, 2017 by Hai Mao and his colleagues from Google, Cygames and MICA Team (now [Sunborn](https://anilist.co/studio/6593/SUNBORN-Network-Technology)), the latter of which is notable for being the developer of [Girls' Frontline](https://anilist.co/anime/128828/Dolls-Frontline/). Hypergryph consists of several subsidiaries such as the development teams for their games or their own label Monster Siren Records for the music related to Arknights.

(Source: Arknights Wikia, edited)
**Minoru Oonishi** is a Japanese art director and art designer.
**Ryuu Sakamoto** is a Japanese art designer and background artist.

__Alma Mater:__ Toyo University

__[Website](https://www.yukihayashi.net/)__ | __[Twitter](https://twitter.com/hayayu1231)__

__Introduction:__
Yuuki Hayashi is a Japanese composer and arranger affiliated with Legendoor, who used to be a rhythmic gymnast

__Biography:__
His history in music began in university when he started creating music pieces for rhythmic gymnasts as a hobby for 5000 yen a piece. When he started getting requests from other universities for his music, his interest in music producing grew. After graduation, he was taught music for 6 months by a rhythmic gymnastics music producer, and now, he handles music for various sports. He also arranges music for dance, athletic competitions, companies, independent movies and recently, TV dramas and anime.

(Source: MyAnimeList, edited)

[YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCDGKZdgRlP__KOCgC58WeWA/featured) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/reo_peko/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/xoxleoxox) | [Website](https://www.reona-reona.com/) | [Spotify](https://open.spotify.com/intl-pt/artist/2SIBY7Jwq1kYng12Zguo3C) 

A Japanese female pop singer under the label SACRA MUSIC, who was a finalist of the 2017 SACRA MUSIC audition. She debuted as "Elsa Kanzaki" (a character in Sword Art Online) on July 4, 2018 with the character mini-album ELZA and as "ReoNa" on August 29, 2018 with the single SWEET HURT.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/hoshieve) | [Weibo](https://weibo.com/hoshieve)

Yui@W is an illustrator and character designer.

[YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCDGKZdgRlP__KOCgC58WeWA/featured) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/reo_peko/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/xoxleoxox) | [Website](https://www.reona-reona.com/) | [Spotify](https://open.spotify.com/intl-pt/artist/2SIBY7Jwq1kYng12Zguo3C) 

A Japanese female pop singer under the label SACRA MUSIC, who was a finalist of the 2017 SACRA MUSIC audition. She debuted as "Elsa Kanzaki" (a character in Sword Art Online) on July 4, 2018 with the character mini-album ELZA and as "ReoNa" on August 29, 2018 with the single SWEET HURT.

**[Twitter](https://twitter.com/kemu8888)**

**Horie Shouta** is a Japanese lyricist, composer, arranger, bassist, pianoist and member of the five-piece rock band [PENGUIN RESEARCH](https://anilist.co/staff/120093).
